::FireBlade::
He shakes his head trying to remember what happened then saw Tantrum...
"Yes...Tahnk you"
FireBLade takes a gulp and stands...
"Stoopid force field"

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Jeremiah <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> Tantrum transforms and flies away from the giants, firing once from his
> catalyst blaster while he leaves. He looks for a target, and sees his
> Decepticon brothers scattered around, and notices Firblade, in poor
shape.
> "Might as well help him out" he says between snorts. He flies
towards him
> and tranforms into bull mode. "Need some energy?" He asks, loosening
one of
> his tanks, so Fireblade can drink from it.
